Package org.logi.crypto

Basic control and exception classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Crypto This class contains numerous static and final utility functions along with global variables for the logi.crypto package.
 

Exception Summary
CryptoException This exception or its sub-classes are thrown whenever a cryptographic error occurs.
InvalidCDSException This exception is thrown whenever a malformed CDS is encountered.
 

Error Summary
CryptoCorruptError This exception is thrown whenever logi.crypto detects that it has been corrupted in some manner.
CryptoError This error or its sub-classes are thrown whenever a serious and unforseen cryptographic error occurs.
 

Package org.logi.crypto Description

Basic control and exception classes.
